RACFGRP7.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   $  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  JUST(LEFT) COLOR(TURQ)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) JUST(LEFT) CAPS(ON)     HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - Group Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
+Add RACF%GROUP+connection: %CONNECT+command
+
+
+PROFILE%===>$GROUP   { (Group profile)
+
{Change one or more of the fields below:+
+
+USERID %===>_ID      { (Enter%NEW{name)
+ACCESS %===>_ACC     { (Access level, USE/JOIN)
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+\ \Press%ENTER+to process or%END+to exit\ \
)INIT
  .CURSOR = ID
  .HELP   = #RACMENU
  &OLDID  = &ID
)PROC
  IF (&OLDID = &ID)
      &ID = ' '
  VER (&GROUP,NB)
  VER (&ID,NB)
  VER (&ACC,LIST,NB,USE,JOIN)
)END

RACFMENU.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   !  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF) SKIP(ON)     COLOR(TURQ)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   ]  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  CAPS(OFF) COLOR(WHITE)
   [  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  CAPS(OFF) COLOR(GREEN)
   {  TYPE(OUTPUT)  PAS(ON)      CAPS(OFF)
   ~  TYPE(PS)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - RACF Administration - V34R7+)\-\
%Option ===>_ZCMD
%
%   0 ~Settings +Customize options      %C ~Command   +Execute RACF commands
%   1 ~User     +User profiles          %D ~DSList    +Dataset list
%   2 ~Group    +Group profiles         %E ~Enqueues  +Dataset enqueues
%   3 ~Dataset  +Dataset profiles       %H ~Help      +RACF help commands
%   4 ~General  +General resources      %L ~ISPLog    +ISPF log file
%   5 ~Password +Password reset         %M ~Messages  +RACF messages
%   6 ~GrpTree  +Group tree report      %O ~OMVSCmds  +OMVS RACF commands
%  ]z {OPT1DESC [OPT1INFO               %R ~Reports   +RACF reports
%  ]z {OPT2DESC [OPT2INFO               %S ~Standards +Coding/design
%  ]z {OPT3DESC [OPT3INFO               %T ~Tutorial  +Help
+  ]z {OPT4DESC [OPT4INFO               %U ~Updates   +Version/updates
+  ]z {OPT5DESC [OPT5INFO               %X ~Exit      +Terminate
+  ]z {OPT6DESC [OPT6INFO              %CA ~CertAuth  +Display certificates
+
+ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
+   RACF:!RACFVER        +PrmDB:!PRMDBASE
+   FMID:!RACFFMID       +BkpDB:!BKPDBASE
+   z/OS:!ZOSVER         +Plex: !ZSYSPLEX       +Lpar:!ZSYSID
+   Date:!USADATE        +JDate:!ZJDATE         +Time:!ZTIME
+  [z    !ZUSER    ]UATT +Group:!RACFGRP        +Name:!RACFNAM
+ ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
)INIT
  .CURSOR = ZCMD
  .HELP   = #RACMENU
  .zvars  = '(OPT1 OPT2 OPT3 OPT4 OPT5 OPT6 UTYPE)'
  &ZPRIM  = YES              /* Make a primary option menu */

  VGET (SETGSTA  SETGSTAP SETGDISP SETGCONF SETGMVS SETGMVSD SETGPREF +
        SETMADMN SETMIRRX SETMIBMM SETMIBMD SETMSHOW SETMTRAC +
        SETMPHRA) PROFILE

  /* Settings - General - Defaults */
  IF (&SETGSTA  = &Z & &SETGSTAP = &Z)
      &SETGSTA  = '100'      /* Status interval (#) = 100  */
      &SETGSTAP = &Z         /* Status interval (%) =      */
  IF (&SETGDISP NE BROWSE, EDIT, VIEW)
      &SETGDISP = 'VIEW'     /* Display files       = VIEW */
  IF (&SETGCONF NE YES, NO)
      &SETGCONF = 'YES'      /* Confirm panel       = YES  */
  IF (&SETGMVS NE YES, NO)
      &SETGMVS = 'YES'       /* Showmvs             = YES  */
  IF (&SETGMVSD NE YES, NO)
      &SETGMVSD = 'NO'       /* Showmvs dataset     = NO   */
  IF (&SETGPREF NE YES, NO)
      &SETGPREF = 'NO'       /* Prefix Dsname       = NO   */

  /* Settings - Management - Defaults */
  IF (&SETMADMN NE YES, NO)
      &SETMADMN = 'NO'       /* Administrator       = NO   */
  IF (&SETMIRRX NE YES, NO)
      &SETMIRRX = 'NO'       /* RACF API (IRRXUTIL) = NO   */
  IF (&SETMIBMM NE YES, NO)
      &SETMIBMM = 'NO'       /* RACF Menu opts 6/7/8       */
  IF (&SETMIBMD NE YES, NO)
      &SETMIBMD = 'NO'       /* RACF LIBEDEF/ALTLIB DSNs   */
  IF (&SETMSHOW NE DISPLAY, LOG, BOTH, NO)
      &SETMSHOW = 'NO'       /* RACF commands       = NO   */
  IF (&SETMTRAC NE LABELS, PROGRAMS, RESULTS, NO)
      &SETMTRAC = 'NO'       /* REXX trace          = NO   */
  IF (&SETMPHRA NE YES, NO)
      &SETMPHRA = 'NO'       /* Passphrases                */

  VPUT (SETGSTA  SETGSTAP SETGDISP SETGCONF SETGMVS  SETGMVSD SETGPREF +
        SETMADMN SETMIRRX SETMIBMM SETMIBMD SETMSHOW SETMTRAC +
        SETMPHRA) PROFILE

  /* Obtain RACF/system info displayed at the bottom of panel */
  &RACFVER  = &Z
  &PRMDBASE = &Z
  &BKPDBASE = &Z
  &RACFGRP  = &Z
  &RACFNAM  = &Z
  &ZOSVER   = &ZOS390RL
  &RACFLMSG = &Z
  &SECSOFT  = &Z
  &RACFFMID = &Z
  &USADATE  = &Z
  &UATT     = &Z
  &UTYPE    = 'User'

  VGET (RACFMENU)                     /* No. of times menu displayed */
  if (&RACFMENU = &Z)
     &RACFMENU = 0

  *REXX (RACFVER PRMDBASE BKPDBASE ZOSVER RACFGRP  RACFNAM RACFLMSG
         SECSOFT RACFFMID USADATE UTYPE SETMADMN UATT RACFMENU
         SETMPHRA)
    CVT      = C2D(STORAGE(10,4))               /* Get RACF FMID     */
    RACFFMID = "HRF"STORAGE(D2X(CVT - 29),4)
    x         = storage(d2x(cvt - 38),5)
    racfver   = 'V'substr(x,3,1)'R'substr(x,5,1)
    cvt      = c2x(storage(10,4))               /* Get Sec. Software */
    cvtrac   = C2x(storage((d2x(x2d(cvt)+992)),4))
    ESM      = storage(d2x(x2d(cvtrac)),4)
    Select
       When (ESM = "RTSS") Then SECSOFT = "TSS"
       When (ESM = "RCVT") Then SECSOFT = "RACF"
       When (ESM = "ACF2") Then SECSOFT = "ACF2"
       Otherwise                SECSOFT = "????"
    End
    IF (SECSOFT <> "RACF") THEN
       RACFLMSG = "RACF is 'NOT' installed on this lpar,",
                  "it is running "SECSOFT
    rcvtstat$ = d2x((x2d(cvtrac))+616)
    rcvtsta$  = d2x((x2d(cvtrac))+56)           /* Get Primary Dbase */
    PRMDBASE  = strip(storage(rcvtsta$,44))
    RCVT      = D2X(X2D(CVT) +X2D(3E0))         /* Get Backup  Dbase */
    RCVT      = C2X(STORAGE(RCVT,4))
    DSDT      = D2X(X2D(RCVT) + X2D(E0))
    DSDT      = C2X(STORAGE(DSDT,4))
    DSDTBACK  = D2X(X2D(DSDT) + X2D(140))
    BNAME     = D2X(X2D(DSDTBACK) + X2D(21))
    BKPDBASE  = STRIP(STORAGE(BNAME,44))
    if pos(left(bkpdbase,1),'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ@#$') = 0
       then bkpdbase = ''
    if (BKPDBASE = "") THEN
        BKPDBASE = "N/A"
    parse var zosver . "z/OS" ZOSVER .          /* Get z/OS version  */
    ascb      = c2x(storage(224,4))     /* PSAAOLD  (My ASCB)        */
    asxb$     = d2x((x2d(ascb))+108)    /* ASCB + 108                */
    asxb      = c2x(storage(asxb$,4))   /* ASCBASXB (My ASXB)        */
    acee$     = d2x((x2d(asxb))+200)    /* ASXB + 200                */
    acee      = c2x(storage(acee$,4))   /* ASXBSENV (My ACEE)        */
    group$    = d2x((x2d(acee))+30)     /* ACEE + 30                 */
    name$     = d2x((x2d(acee))+100)    /* ACEE + 100                */
    name$     = c2x(storage(name$,4))   /* ACEEUNAM Ptr              */
    name$     = d2x((x2d(name$))+1)     /* ACEEUNAM Ptr +1           */
    RACFGRP   = storage(group$,8)       /* ACEEGRPN (RACF group name)*/
    RACFNAM   = storage(name$,20)       /* ACEEUNAM (RACF user name) */
    USADATE   = DATE('U')

    if (setmadmn = 'YES') then          /* Display User or Admn?     */
       utype = 'Admn:'
    else
       utype = 'User:'

    RACFMENU = RACFMENU + 1           /* No. of times menu displayed */
    Access   = ""
    user     = userid()                 /* Does user have necessary  */
    x        = outtrap('lu.')           /* access to display profiles*/
    'LISTUSER 'user                     /* and general resources?    */
    x        = outtrap('off')
    uatt     = ''
    lu34 = substr(lu.3,2+11)||substr(lu.4,2+11)
    if (pos('AUDITOR',lu34) > 0) then do
       uatt   = uatt'A'
       access = access'A'
    end
    if (pos('OPERATIONS',lu34) > 0) then
       uatt   = uatt'O'
    if (pos('ROAUDIT',lu34) > 0) then do
       uatt   = uatt'R'
       access = access'A'
    end
    if (pos('SPECIAL',lu34) > 0) then do
       uatt     = uatt'S'
       access   = access'A'
       setmadmn = 'YES'         /* Make Administrator */
       utype    = 'Admn:'
    end
    if (RACFLMSG = "") & (ACCESS = "") THEN DO
       RACFLMSG = "Userid ("userid") has limited access",
                  "to display/view entries, due to it",
                  "does NOT have the attribute AUDITOR,",
                  "ROAUDIT or SPECIAL."
    end

    if racfmenu = 1 then do
      x = outtrap('var.')
      "PARMLIB LIST(LOGON)"
      x = outtrap('off')
      Do i = 1 to var.0
         parse var var.i 'PASSPHRASE(' pphrase ')'
         if (pphrase = 'ON') | (pphrase = 'OFF') then leave
      end
      if (SETMPHRA = "YES") & (pphrase <> "ON") THEN
        RACFLMSG = "PASSPHRASE(OFF) in PARMLIB member IKJTSOxx",
                   "conflicts with Passphrase value in Settings"
    end
  *ENDREXX
  VPUT (RACFMENU)                     /* No. of times menu displayed */
  VPUT (SETMADMN) PROFILE             /* Update SETMADMN in profile  */

  IF (&RACFMENU = 1 & &RACFLMSG NE "")     /* Display long message?  */
     .MSG  = RACF011

  IF (&SETGMVS EQ YES)                     /* Add menu options when  */
     &OPT1     = 7                         /* Settings (Opt 0) has   */
     &OPT2     = 8                         /* 'Showmvs data = Y'     */
     &OPT3     = 9
     &OPT1DESC = RACFData
     &OPT2DESC = RACFDB
     &OPT3DESC = RACFPrms
     &OPT1INFO = 'RACF data (Showmvs)'
     &OPT2INFO = 'RACF databases'
     &OPT3INFO = 'RACF parameters'
     &OPT1CMD  = 'CMD(%RACFMVS)'
     &OPT2CMD  = 'CMD(%RACFDB)'
     &OPT3CMD  = 'CMD(%RACFPRMS)'
  IF (&SETGMVS EQ NO)                      /* Add menu options when  */
     &OPT1     = 7                         /* Settings (Opt 0) has   */
     &OPT2     = 8                         /* 'Showmvs data = N'     */
     &OPT3     = &Z
     &OPT1DESC = RACFDB
     &OPT2DESC = RACFPrms
     &OPT3DESC = &Z
     &OPT1INFO = 'RACF databases'
     &OPT2INFO = 'RACF parameters'
     &OPT3INFO = &Z
     &OPT1CMD  = 'CMD(%RACFDB)'
     &OPT2CMD  = 'CMD(%RACFPRMS)'
     &OPT3CMD  = &Z
  IF (&SETMIBMM EQ YES & &SETGMVS = YES)   /* Add menu options when  */
     &OPT4     = 10                        /* Settings (Opt 0) has   */
     &OPT5     = 11                        /* 'Showmvs data  = Y'    */
     &OPT6     = 12                        /* 'IBM RACF data = Y'    */
     &OPT4DESC = IBMSys
     &OPT5DESC = IBMRRSF
     &OPT6DESC = IBMCert
     &OPT4INFO = 'RACF system options'
     &OPT5INFO = 'RACF remote services'
     &OPT6INFO = 'RACF certificates'
     &OPT4CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 5)'
     &OPT5CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 6)'
     &OPT6CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 7)'
  IF (&SETMIBMM EQ YES & &SETGMVS = NO)    /* Add menu options when  */
     &OPT3     = 9                         /* Settings (Opt 0) has   */
     &OPT4     = 10                        /* 'Showmvs data  = N'    */
     &OPT5     = 11                        /* 'IBM RACF data = Y'    */
     &OPT6     = &Z
     &OPT3DESC = IBMSys
     &OPT4DESC = IBMRRSF
     &OPT5DESC = IBMCert
     &OPT6DESC = &Z
     &OPT3INFO = 'RACF system options'
     &OPT4INFO = 'RACF remote services'
     &OPT5INFO = 'RACF certificates'
     &OPT6INFO = &Z
     &OPT3CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 5)'
     &OPT4CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 6)'
     &OPT5CMD  = 'cmd(%racfIBM 7)'
     &OPT6CMD  = &Z
  IF (&SETMIBMM NE YES)                    /* When Settings (Opt 0)  */
     &OPT4     = &z                        /* is 'IBM RACF data = N' */
     &OPT5     = &z
     &OPT6     = &z
     &OPT4DESC = &z
     &OPT5DESC = &z
     &OPT6DESC = &z
     &OPT4INFO = &z
     &OPT5INFO = &z
     &OPT6INFO = &z
     &OPT4CMD  = &z
     &OPT5CMD  = &z
     &OPT6CMD  = &z

  IF (&RACFMENU = 1 & &OPT NE &Z)    /* If invoked passing a menu   */
     &NOMENU = Y                     /* option, invoke the option   */
  IF (&RACFMENU = 1 & &OPT = &Z)     /* and F3(END) out of RACFADM  */
     &NOMENU = N
  IF (&RACFMENU > 1  & &NOMENU = Y)
     &ZCMD = X
     .RESP = END
)PROC
  &ZSEL=TRANS(TRUNC(&ZCMD,'.')
      0,'CMD(%RACFSETG)'
      1,'CMD(%RACFUSR)'
      2,'CMD(%RACFGRP)'
      3,'CMD(%RACFDSN)'
      4,'CMD(%RACFCLSR)'
      5,'CMD(%RACFPSWD)'
      6,'CMD(%RACFGTRE)'
    &OPT1,&OPT1CMD
    &OPT2,&OPT2CMD
    &OPT3,&OPT3CMD
    &OPT4,&OPT4CMD
    &OPT5,&OPT5CMD
    &OPT6,&OPT6CMD
     99,'CMD(%RACFCLSA)'        /* Analyze - Verify ACL */  /* Hidden */
      B,'CMD(%BOOKMGR SHELF(''EOYBOOK.ICHZBKC0.BKSHELF''))' /* Hidden */
      C,'CMD(%RACFCMDS)'
     CA,'CMD(%RACFCERT)'
      D,'CMD(%RACFDSL)'
      E,'CMD(%RACFENQS)'
      H,'CMD(%RACFHELP)'
      I,'CMD(%RACFLOG $ISSUES)' /* Known issues (PMRs)  */  /* Hidden */
      L,'CMD(%RACFLOG ISPLOG)'
      M,'CMD(%RACFMSG)'
      O,'CMD(%RACFOMVS)'
      R,'CMD(%RACFRPTS)'
      S,'CMD(%RACFLOG $STNDARD)'
      T,'PGM(ISPTUTOR) PARM(#RACMENU)'
      U,'CMD(%RACFLOG $UPDATES)'
      X,'EXIT'
    ' ',' '
      *,'?')
)PNTS
  FIELD(ZPS00001) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('0')
  FIELD(ZPS00002) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('C')
  FIELD(ZPS00003) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('1')
  FIELD(ZPS00004) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('D')
  FIELD(ZPS00005) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('2')
  FIELD(ZPS00006) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('E')
  FIELD(ZPS00007) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('3')
  FIELD(ZPS00008) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('H')
  FIELD(ZPS00009) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('4')
  FIELD(ZPS00010) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('L')
  FIELD(ZPS00011) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('5')
  FIELD(ZPS00012) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('M')
  FIELD(ZPS00013) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('6')
  FIELD(ZPS00014) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('O')
  FIELD(OPT1DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('7')
  FIELD(ZPS00015) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('R')
  FIELD(OPT2DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('8')
  FIELD(ZPS00016) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('S')
  FIELD(OPT3DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('9')
  FIELD(ZPS00017) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('T')
  FIELD(OPT4DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('10')
  FIELD(ZPS00018) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('U')
  FIELD(OPT5DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('11')
  FIELD(ZPS00019) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('X')
  FIELD(OPT6DESC) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('12')
  FIELD(ZPS00020) VAR(ZCMD) VAL('CA')
)END
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                             Comments                               */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                                                                    */
/*  1) This panel is defined as a primary menu, allowing the          */
/*     capability to type in =1, =2, =n to jump around from one       */
/*     panel to another                                               */
/*                                                                    */
/*  2) The )INIT section executes a REXX code to:                     */
/*     - Obtain RACF information displayed at the bottom of panel     */
/*       (RACF, Dbase, z/OS, etc)                                     */
/*     - Verify RACF is executing, if not issue message               */
/*                                                                    */
/*  3) The default Settings, menu option 0, are defined in the        */
/*     )INIT section of this panel and the naming standards for       */
/*     the these variables are:                                       */
/*     - Syntax                                                       */
/*         SET#????                                                   */
/*     - Where                                                        */
/*         SET .... Settings (option 0)                               */
/*         # ...... G=General, M=Management, T=Adding TSO Userid      */
/*                  P=Program/Panel (Load, REXX or CLIST member),     */
/*                  D=Dataset, J=JCL and R=Refresh                    */
/*          ???? ... Field name, any characters and for Refresh       */
/*                   variables (4th chr = R) the section name         */
/*                   (GEN, MGT, TSO, MVS, IBM, RPT and MSG)           */
/*     - The REXX programs and panels will translate the abbreviated  */
/*       contents to its full word, in hopes of making it easier to   */
/*       understand/maintain the code, for example: Y, will be        */
/*       translated to YES                                            */
/*                                                                    */
/*  4) The following are the menu entry standards:                    */
/*     - Numbered entries (1-99) are designated for obtaining,        */
/*       displaying and changing the RACF database (Userids,          */
/*       Groups, etc.) and customizing the utility (Settings)         */
/*     - Alphabetic entries (A-Z) are used to assist in maintaining   */
/*       or documenting RACFADM                                       */
/*                                                                    */
/*  5) Below hidden menu options (not displayed):                     */
/*       99  Analyze   Verify ACL                                     */
/*        I  Issues    Known problems                                 */
/*        B  BookMgr   RACF manuals                                   */
/*                                                                    */
/*  6) The menu entries (Settings, User, etc.) are point-n-shoot      */
/*     fields                                                         */
/*                                                                    */
/*  7) Can pass a menu option as a parameter                          */
/*     - It will select the menu option and exit out of RACFADM       */
/*                                                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

RACFMSG.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)  HILITE(USCORE)
   %  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(GREEN)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(BLUE)
   !  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(TURQ)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - RACF Messages+)\-\
%Command ==>_ZCMD
+
%Search:
+  Userid!......._RACFMID { (&USERID, *)
+  Lpar!........._RACFMLPR{ (&LPAR, *)
+  Date!........._RACFMDAT{ (mm/dd/yy, =, *)
+  Type!........._Z{        (A=All, I=Insufficient, V=Violation)
+  USS Only!....._Z{        (Y=Yes, N=No)
+
%Process:
+  Mode!........._Z{        (F=Foreground, B=Batch)
+  Edit JCL!....._Z{        (Y=Yes, N=No)
+
%File:
+  Log!.........._Z{        (O=Operlog, S=Syslog)
+  Scan!........._Z{        (A=Active log, B=Backup DSN)
+  Backup DSN!..._SETDMSG                                     +
+
%Job card:
_ZLLGJOB1
_ZLLGJOB2
_ZLLGJOB3
_ZLLGJOB4
)INIT
  .CURSOR = RACFMID
  .HELP   = #RACMSG
  .ZVARS  = '(RACFMTYP RACFMUSS RACFMMOD RACFMJCL SETLMSG RACFMSCN)'
)PROC
   IF (&RACFMID EQ &Z)
      &RACFMID = *
   IF (&LPAR EQ &Z)
      &LPAR = *
   IF (&RACFMID NE *)
      VER (&RACFMID,NB,NAME)
   IF (&RACFMLPR NE *)
      VER (&RACFMLPR,NB,NAME)

   *REXX(RACFMDAT)
    if racfmdat = '=' then
       racfmdat = date('u')
   *ENDREXX

   IF (&RACFMDAT NE *)
      &TMPDATE = &RACFMDAT
      *REXX(*)
        RACFMDAT = SUBSTR(RACFMDAT,7,2)"/"||,
                   SUBSTR(RACFMDAT,1,2)"/"||,
                   SUBSTR(RACFMDAT,4,2)
      *ENDREXX
      VER (&RACFMDAT,NB,IDATE)
      &RACFMDAT = &TMPDATE

   VER (&RACFMTYP,NB,LIST,A,V,I)
   VER (&RACFMUSS,NB,LIST,Y,N)
   VER (&RACFMMOD,NB,LIST,F,B)
   VER (&RACFMJCL,NB,LIST,Y,N)
   VER (&SETLMSG,NB,LIST,O,S)
   VER (&RACFMSCN,NB,LIST,A,B)

   IF (&RACFMSCN = B)
      IF (.MSG = &Z & &SETDMSG NE &Z)
         &BADDSN   = N
         &RACFSMSG = &Z
         &RACFLMSG = &Z
         &TMPDMSG1 = &Z
         &TMPDMSG2 = &Z
         *REXX (SETDMSG  BADDSN RACFSMSG RACFLMSG RACFMDAT
                SETGPREF TMPDMSG1 TMPDMSG2)
            X = MSG("OFF")
            IF (SETGPREF = "YES") THEN DO
               IF (SUBSTR(SETDMSG,1,1) <> "'") THEN
                  TMPDMSG1 = SYSVAR('SYSPREF')"."SETDMSG
               ELSE
                  TMPDMSG1 = STRIP(SETDMSG,,"'")
            END
            ELSE
               TMPDMSG1 = STRIP(SETDMSG,,"'")
            PARSE VAR TMPDMSG1 DSN1 "&" SYMBOL "." DSN2
            SYMBVAL  = MVSVAR("SYMDEF",SYMBOL)
            TMPDMSG2 = DSN1""SYMBVAL""DSN2
            IF (RACFMDAT = "*") THEN DO
               X = OUTTRAP("LC.")
               ADDRESS TSO "LISTCAT ENT('"TMPDMSG2"')"
               X = OUTTRAP("OFF")
               PARSE VAR LC.1 W1 W2 .
               IF (W1 = "GDG") & (W2 = "BASE") THEN DO
                  RACFSMSG = 'Invalid Backup DSN'
                  RACFLMSG = 'Can not use a base GDG when date is',
                             'an asterick (*).'
                  BADDSN   = "Y"
                  RETURN
               END
            END
            PARSE VAR TMPDMSG2 DSN "(" GDGNO ")" .
            IF (DATATYPE(GDGNO,'N') = 1) THEN DO
               X = OUTTRAP("LC.")
               "LISTCAT ENT('"DSN"')"
               X = OUTTRAP("OFF")
               IF (LC.0 > (2 - 2 * GDGNO)) THEN DO
                  A   = LC.0 - 1 + 2 * GDGNO
                  TMPDMSG2 = SUBWORD(LC.A,3,1)
               END
               DROP LC.
            END
            CHKDSN = "'"TMPDMSG2"'"
            IF (SYSDSN(CHKDSN) <> "OK") THEN DO
               RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
               RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside',
                          'in the catalog or on a disk',
                          'pack, please investigate.',
                          ' DSN = 'CHKDSN
               BADDSN   = "Y"
            END
         *ENDREXX

  IF (&BADDSN = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDMSG
     .MSG    = RACF011

  IF (&RACFMMOD = B)
     VER(&ZLLGJOB1,NB)
)END

)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)

)PROC

RACFOMVS.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF) JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   ~  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   !  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)  COLOR(TURQ)  CAPS(OFF)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   ^  AREA(DYNAMIC) EXTEND(OFF)
   [  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(TURQ)
   ]  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(BLUE)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - OMVS RACF Commands+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
+
+Enter%OMVS RACF+command options:+
+
+Command %===>~z     {^OMVSCMDS                                                ^
+
+Path    %===>_z
+Operands%===>_z


+
+
%Command                               Description
%-------  -\-\-
!Flist   {Unix ZFS/HFS File Usage and Attribute Information
!Glist   {Unix Group Identifier (GID) List
!Permit  {Unix Access Control List (ACL) Management
!RAlter  {Unix Security Attribute Management
!RList   {Unix Directory/File Security Information
^OMVSDES1                                                                      ^
^OMVSDES2                                                                      ^
)INIT
  .HELP = #RACOMVS
  .ZVARS   = '(OMVSCMD OMVSPATH OMVSOPTS)'
)PROC
  *REXX (OMVSCMD)
     SELECT
        WHEN (abbrev("FLIST",OMVSCMD,1)  = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "FLIST"
        WHEN (abbrev("GLIST",OMVSCMD,1)  = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "GLIST"
        WHEN (abbrev("PERMIT",OMVSCMD,1) = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "PERMIT"
        WHEN (abbrev("RALTER",OMVSCMD,2) = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "RALTER"
        WHEN (abbrev("RLIST",OMVSCMD,2)  = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "RLIST"
        WHEN (abbrev("SLIST",OMVSCMD,1)  = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "SLIST"
        WHEN (abbrev("ULIST",OMVSCMD,1)  = 1) THEN
             OMVSCMD = "ULIST"
        OTHERWISE
             NOP
     END
  *ENDREXX
  VGET (SETGMVS) PROFILE
  IF (&SETGMVS = YES)
     VER (&OMVSCMD,NB,LIST,FLIST,GLIST,PERMIT,RALTER,RLIST,SLIST,ULIST)
  ELSE
     VER (&OMVSCMD,NB,LIST,FLIST,GLIST,PERMIT,RALTER,RLIST,ULIST)
)END
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                             Comments                               */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                                                                    */
/*  1) The )PROC section executes a REXX code to:                     */
/*     - Translate the abbreviated command                            */
/*                                                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

RACFPSWD.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   [  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(GREEN)
   ]  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(HIGH)
   !  TYPE(DATAIN)  INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   ¬  AREA(DYNAMIC) EXTEND(OFF)
)Body window(36,9) expand(\\)
%Command ===>_zcmd
+
+  Userid  %===>_userid  +
+ ¬PSWDFLD                     ¬+
+
+  RESUME  %===>_z{    (Y=Yes, N=No)
+
+%ENTER+to continue or%F3+to cancel
)Init
  .cursor  = userid
  .zvars   = '(resume)'
  .HELP    = #RACPSWD
  &ZWINTTL = 'RACFADM - Password Reset'
  VGET (SETMPHRA)
  *REXX (SETMPHRA, PSWDFLD, PSWD)
     IF SETMPHRA = 'YES' THEN DO
       PSWD = LEFT(PSWD,14)
       PSWDFLD = '[Phrase  ]===>!'pswd||']'
       END
     ELSE DO
       PSWD = LEFT(PSWD,8)
       PSWDFLD = '[Password]===>!'pswd||']'
       END
  *ENDREXX
  if (&resume = '')
     &resume = 'N'
)Proc
  *REXX (PSWDFLD, PSWD, USERID, RACFLMSG)    /* Get password */
     IF SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,2,6) = 'Phrase' THEN DO
       PSWD = SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,16,14)

       alpha = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
       pswd_upper = translate(pswd)
       if pos(userid,pswd_upper) > 0 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase contains Userid'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       x = 0; y= 0
       do n = 1 to 14
         if verify(substr(pswd,n,1),alpha) = 0 then
           x = x + 1
         else
           y = y + 1
         end
       if x < 2 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase must contain 2 alpha chars'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       if y < 2 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase must contain 2 non-alpha chars'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       do n = 1 to 12
         if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+1,1) then
           if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+2,1) then do
             zrxrc  = 8
             RACFLMSG = 'Phrase contains repeating characters'
             zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
             end
         end
       END
     ELSE
       PSWD = SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,16,8)
  *ENDREXX
  ver (&userid,nb,name)
  ver (&pswd,nb)
)End

RACFPSWE.text:

       if x < 2 then do

         end
       if y < 2 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase must contain 2 non-alpha chars'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       do n = 1 to 12
         if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+1,1) then
           if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+2,1) then do
             zrxrc  = 8

         end
       END
     ELSE

  *ENDREXX

RACFRPTJ.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)  HILITE(USCORE)
   %  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY WINDOW(76,13)
+
%Command ===>_ZCMD
+
%Job statement information:
_ZLLGJOB1
_ZLLGJOB2
_ZLLGJOB3
_ZLLGJOB4
+
%Temporary dataset information:
+  UNIT  =_SETJRPTU+
+  SPACE =_SETJRPTS            +
)INIT
  &ZCMD    = &Z
  &ZWINTTL = 'RACFADM - Define JOB Card'

)PROC

RACFSAVE.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   %  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(WHITE) SKIP(ON)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(GREEN) SKIP(ON)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(BLUE)  SKIP(ON)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) COLOR(RED)   CAPS(ON) HILITE(USCORE)
)BODY WINDOW(57,13)
+
%Cmd=>_ZCMD
+
+ Insert PDS/member name or sequential file name:
+
+ PDS/Seq%=_RACFSDSN                                    +
+ Member %=_RACFSMBR+
+
+ Save as%=_Z{ (T=text, C=CSV)
+ Replace%=_Z{ (Y/N)
+
+        ENTER%=+PROCESS                PF3%=+END
+
)INIT
  &ZCMD    = ' '
  &ZWINTTL = 'RACFADM - Save to DSN'
  .ZVARS   = '(RACFSFIL RACFSREP)'
  .CURSOR  = RACFSDSN
  .HELP    = #RACMENU
)PROC
  &LEN = LENGTH(RACFSDSN)
  IF (&LEN < 43)
     VER (&RACFSDSN,NB,DSNAME)
  ELSE
     VER (&RACFSDSN,NB)
  VER (&RACFSMBR,NAME)
  VER (&RACFSFIL,NB,LIST,T,C)
  VER (&RACFSREP,NB,LIST,Y,N)
)END

RACFSETG.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(¬+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   @  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF) JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   }  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(RED)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   ~  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(TURQ)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(¬RACFADM - Settings+)\-\
¬Command ===>_ZCMD
¬
¬General
+  Default filter{...._Z                              { Search string (optional)
+  Status interval{..._Z   ~(0-9999){or_Z ~% (0-99)    {Progress message number
+  Display files{....._Z~ (B=Browse, E=Edit, V=View)   {Display reports/files
+  Confirm panel{....._Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)                {Confirm command request
+  Showmvs data{......_Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)+Pgm/DSN_Z{      Showmvs RACF data
+  Prefix dataset{...._Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)                {Use TSO prefix as HLQ
+
¬Management
+  Administrator{....._Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)                {Line cmds add/chg/etc.
+  Admin RACF API{...._Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)                {IRRXUTIL to add/chg/prof
+  IBM RACF opts{....._Z~ (Y=Yes, N=No)+Panel/DSNs_Z{   RACF Systems/RRSF/Certs
+  RACF commands{....._Z~ (D=Display, L=Log, B=Both, N=No)     {View  RACF cmds
+  REXX trace{........_Z~ (L=Labels, P=Pgms, R=Results, N=No)  {Trace REXX pgms
+
¬Adding TSO userids
+  Default password{..@Z             ~ +Passphrase_Z{ { New/chg user's password
+  User catalog{......_Z                              { z/OS alias catalog
+  ISPPROF dataset{..._Z                              { Append qualifiers to id
+  User dataset{......_Z                              { Append qualifiers to id
)INIT
  VGET (SETGFLTR SETGSTA  SETGSTAP SETGDISP  SETGCONF SETGMVS  +
        SETGMVSD SETGPREF +
        SETMADMN SETMIRRX SETMIBMM SETMIBMD  SETMSHOW SETMTRAC +
        SETTPSWD SETMPHRA SETTCTLG SETTPROF SETTUDSN) PROFILE

  /* General Settings */
  IF (&SETGSTA NE &Z)
     &SETGSTAP = ''
  &SETGDISP = TRANS (&SETGDISP BROWSE,B EDIT,E VIEW,V *,*)
  &SETGCONF = TRANS (&SETGCONF YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETGMVS  = TRANS (&SETGMVS  YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETGMVSD = TRANS (&SETGMVSD YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETGPREF = TRANS (&SETGPREF YES,Y NO,N *,*)

  /* Management Settings */
  &SETMADMN = TRANS (&SETMADMN YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETMIRRX = TRANS (&SETMIRRX YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETMIBMM = TRANS (&SETMIBMM YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETMIBMD = TRANS (&SETMIBMD YES,Y NO,N *,*)
  &SETMSHOW = TRANS (&SETMSHOW DISPLAY,D LOG,L BOTH,B NO,N *,*)
  &SETMTRAC = TRANS (&SETMTRAC LABELS,L PROGRAMS,P RESULTS,R NO,N *,*)
  &SETMPHRA = TRANS (&SETMPHRA YES,Y NO,N *,*)

  .ZVARS = '(SETGFLTR SETGSTA  SETGSTAP SETGDISP SETGCONF +
             SETGMVS  SETGMVSD SETGPREF +
             SETMADMN SETMIRRX SETMIBMM SETMIBMD SETMSHOW SETMTRAC +
             SETTPSWD SETMPHRA SETTCTLG SETTPROF SETTUDSN)'

  .HELP   = #RACSET1
  .CURSOR = SETGFLTR
)PROC
  /* General Settings */
  &SETGDISP = TRANS (&SETGDISP B,BROWSE E,EDIT V,VIEW *,*)
  &SETGCONF = TRANS (&SETGCONF Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETGMVS  = TRANS (&SETGMVS  Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETGMVSD = TRANS (&SETGMVSD Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETGPREF = TRANS (&SETGPREF Y,YES, N,NO *,*)

  /* Management Settings */
  &SETMADMN = TRANS (&SETMADMN Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETMIRRX = TRANS (&SETMIRRX Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETMIBMM = TRANS (&SETMIBMM Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETMIBMD = TRANS (&SETMIBMD Y,YES, N,NO *,*)
  &SETMSHOW = TRANS (&SETMSHOW D,DISPLAY L,LOG B,BOTH N,NO *,*)
  &SETMTRAC = TRANS (&SETMTRAC L,LABELS P,PROGRAMS R,RESULTS, N,NO *,*)
  &SETMPHRA = TRANS (&SETMPHRA Y,YES, N,NO *,*)

  /* General Settings */
  IF (&SETGSTA > 0)
     VER (&SETGSTA,NB,RANGE,0,9999)
     VER (&SETGSTAP,LIST, )
  IF (&SETGSTAP > 0)
     VER (&SETGSTA,LIST, )
     VER (&SETGSTAP,NB,RANGE,1,99)
  IF (&SETGSTA = &Z & &SETGSTAP = &Z)
     &SETGSTA = 0
  VER (&SETGDISP,NB,LIST,BROWSE,EDIT,VIEW)
  VER (&SETGCONF,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETGMVS,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETGMVSD,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETGPREF,NB,LIST,NO,YES)

  /* Management Settings */
  VER (&SETMADMN,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETMIRRX,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETMIBMM,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETMIBMD,NB,LIST,NO,YES)
  VER (&SETMSHOW,NB,LIST,DISPLAY,LOG,BOTH,NO)
  VER (&SETMTRAC,NB,LIST,LABELS,PROGRAMS,RESULTS,NO)
  VER (&SETMPHRA,NB,LIST,NO,YES)

  /* Adding TSO Userid Settings */
  *REXX (SETTCTLG SETTPROF DSTTUDSN)
        SETTCTLG = STRIP(SETTCTLG,,"'")
        SETTPROF = STRIP(SETTPROF,,"'")
        SETTUDSN = STRIP(SETTUDSN,,"'")
  *ENDREXX

  VPUT (SETGFLTR SETGSTA  SETGSTAP SETGDISP  SETGCONF SETGMVS  +
        SETGMVSD SETGPREF +
        SETMADMN SETMIRRX SETMIBMM SETMIBMD  SETMSHOW SETMTRAC +
        SETTPSWD SETMPHRA SETTCTLG SETTPROF SETTUDSN) PROFILE
)END
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                             Comments                               */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                                                                    */
/*  1) The variables contain the full word, no abbreviations, in      */
/*     hopes of making it easier to understand/maintain code          */
/*                                                                    */
/*  2) Naming standards for variables:                                */
/*     - Syntax                                                       */
/*         SET#????                                                   */
/*     - Where                                                        */
/*         SET .... Settings (option 0)                               */
/*         # ...... G=General, M=Management, T=Adding TSO Userid,     */
/*                  P=Program/Panel (Load, REXX or CLIST member),     */
/*                  D=Dataset, J=JCL and R=Refresh                    */
/*          ???? ... Field name, any characters and for Refresh       */
/*                   variables (4th chr = R) the section name         */
/*                   (GEN, MGT, TSO, MVS, IBM, RPT and MSG)           */
/*     - The REXX programs and panels will translate the abbreviated  */
/*       contents to its full word, in hopes of making it easier to   */
/*       understand/maintain the code, for example: Y, will be        */
/*       translated to YES                                            */
/*                                                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

RACFSETH.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   !  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(TURQ)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - Settings+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
{Specify the!program name{and dataset to!LIBDEF:
+
%Program
+  Name ......_SETPMVS +
+
%Dataset
+  Linklib ..._SETDMVSL                                    +
+
%Note
{  - Leave linklib dataset%blank,{if module exist in LINKLIST, STEPLIB,
{    or ISPLLIB, else, must supply dataset name containing executable,
{    single quotes are!not{required
)INIT
  VGET (SETPMVS SETDMVSL) PROFILE
  IF (&SETPMVS = &Z)
     &SETPMVS = SHOWZOS
  .HELP   = #RACSET1
  .CURSOR = SETPMVS
)PROC
  &RACFSMSG = &Z
  &RACFLMSG = &Z

  VER (&SETPMVS,NB,NAME)
  VER (&SETDMVSL,DSNAME)

  &BADMBR = N
  &BADDSN = N
  *REXX (SETPMVS SETDMVSL BADMBR BADDSN RACFSMSG RACFLMSG)
     SETDMVSL = STRIP(SETDMVSL,,"'")
     IF (SETDMVSL <> "") THEN DO
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDMVSL"'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside in the catalog',
                      'or on a disk pack, please investigate.'
           BADDSN   = "Y"
           return
        END
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDMVSL"("SETPMVS")'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'Program does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The program name does not reside in the',
                      'linklib dataset, please investigate.'
           BADMBR   = "Y"
           return
        END
     END
  *ENDREXX

  IF (&BADMBR = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETPMVS
     .MSG    = RACF011
  IF (&BADDSN = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDMVSL
     .MSG    = RACF011

  IF (.MSG = &Z)
     VPUT (SETPMVS SETDMVSL) PROFILE
)END

RACFSETI.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
   !  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(TURQ)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - Settings+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
{Specify the!panel name{and datasets to!ALTLIB/LIBDEF
+
%Panel
+  Name ......._SETPIBM +
+
%Datasets
+  Messages ..._SETDIBMM                                    +
+  Panels ....._SETDIBMP                                    +
+  Skeltons ..._SETDIBMS                                    +
+  Clist ......_SETDIBMC                                    +
+
%Note
{  - Leave%blank,{if modules exist in allocated TSO/ISPF datasets, else,
{    must supply all four datasets (messages, panels, skeletons and CLIST),
{    single quotes are!not{required
)INIT
  VGET (SETPIBM SETDIBMM SETDIBMP SETDIBMS SETDIBMC) PROFILE
  IF (&SETPIBM = &Z)
     &SETPIBM = ICHP00
  .HELP   = #RACSET1
  .CURSOR = SETPIBM
)PROC
  &RACFSMSG = &Z
  &RACFLMSG = &Z

  VER (&SETPIBM,NB,NAME)
  VER (&SETDIBMM,DSNAME)
  VER (&SETDIBMP,DSNAME)
  VER (&SETDIBMS,DSNAME)
  VER (&SETDIBMC,DSNAME)

  IF (&SETDIBMM NE &Z & &SETDIBMP NE &Z +
   &  &SETDIBMS NE &Z & &SETDIBMC NE &Z)
      &Z = &Z
  ELSE
     IF (&SETDIBMM EQ &Z & &SETDIBMP EQ &Z +
      &  &SETDIBMS EQ &Z & &SETDIBMC EQ &Z)
         &Z = &Z
     ELSE
         &RACFSMSG = 'Empty dataset name'
         &RACFLMSG = 'All datasets must contain a valid dataset +
                      name or all datasets must be empty.'
         VER (&SETDIBMM,NB,DSNAME,MSG=RACF011)
         VER (&SETDIBMP,NB,DSNAME,MSG=RACF011)
         VER (&SETDIBMS,NB,DSNAME,MSG=RACF011)
         VER (&SETDIBMC,NB,DSNAME,MSG=RACF011)

  &BADPANL = N
  &BADDSNM = N
  &BADDSNP = N
  &BADDSNS = N
  &BADDSNC = N
  *REXX (SETPIBM SETDIBMM SETDIBMP SETDIBMS SETDIBMC RACFSMSG RACFLMSG
         BADDSNM BADDSNP BADDSNS BADDSNC BADPANL)
     SETDIBMM = STRIP(SETDIBMM,,"'")
     SETDIBMP = STRIP(SETDIBMP,,"'")
     SETDIBMS = STRIP(SETDIBMS,,"'")
     SETDIBMC = STRIP(SETDIBMC,,"'")
     IF (SETDIBMM <> "") THEN
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDIBMM"'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside in the catalog',
                      'or on a disk pack, please investigate.'
           BADDSNM  = "Y"
           return
        END
     IF (SETDIBMP <> "") THEN DO
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDIBMP"'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside in the catalog',
                      'or on a disk pack, please investigate.'
           BADDSNP  = "Y"
           return
        END
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDIBMP"("SETPIBM")'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'Panel does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The panel member does not reside in the',
                      'panel dataset name, please investigate.'
           BADPANL  = "Y"
           return
        END
     END
     IF (SETDIBMS <> "") THEN
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDIBMS"'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside in the catalog',
                      'or on a disk pack, please investigate.'
           BADDSNS  = "Y"
           return
        END
     IF (SETDIBMC <> "") THEN
        IF (SYSDSN("'"SETDIBMC"'") <> "OK") THEN DO
           RACFSMSG = 'DSN does not exist'
           RACFLMSG = 'The dataset does not reside in the catalog',
                      'or on a disk pack, please investigate.'
           BADDSNC  = "Y"
           return
        END
  *ENDREXX

  IF (&BADPANL = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETPIBM
     .MSG    = RACF011
  IF (&BADDSNM = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDIBMM
     .MSG    = RACF011
  IF (&BADDSNP = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDIBMP
     .MSG    = RACF011
  IF (&BADDSNS = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDIBMS
     .MSG    = RACF011
  IF (&BADDSNC = Y)
     .CURSOR = SETDIBMC
     .MSG    = RACF011

  IF (.MSG = &Z)
     VPUT (SETPIBM SETDIBMM SETDIBMP SETDIBMS SETDIBMC) PROFILE
)END

RACFUSRT.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   $  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(TURQ)  JUST(LEFT)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                              +Scroll==>_SAMT+
%
%
%Message
%-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
)MODEL
$Z                                                                             +
)INIT
  .ZVARS = '(MSG)'
  .HELP  = #RACMENU
  &ZCMD  = ' '
  IF (&SAMT = ' ')
      &SAMT = &ZSCED
)END

RACFUSR1.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(~+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON) JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(BLUE)
   !  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(TURQ)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON) COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(~RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
~Command ===>_ZCMD
~
+Process RACF~USER+profiles
+
{This function uses the RACF search command to generate a selection list.
{It is advisable to restrict the search to improve performance.
+
+
+
+RACF Filter~===>_RFILTER {                               (Enter search string)
+
+
+
+Filter examples:!IC*          CA*             ZOS*
+                !ICN*         YSC*            *
+
+Wild cards:     !%  {Indicates one character
!                 *  {Indicates one or more characters
!                 ** {Indicates any number of qualifiers
+
+
+\ \Press~ENTER+to process or~END+to exit\ \
)INIT
  .CURSOR = RFILTER
  .HELP   = #RACMENU
)PROC
  VER  (&RFILTER,NB)
)END

RACFUSR4.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   $  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  JUST(LEFT) COLOR(TURQ)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) JUST(LEFT) CAPS(ON)     HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
+Connect RACF%USER+profile: %CONNECT+command
+
+PROFILE%===>$USER    +$NAME
+
+ID     %===>_ID      { (User or group)
+ACC    %===>_ACC     { (Access level, USE/JOIN)
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+\ \Press%ENTER+to process or%END+to exit\ \
)INIT
  .CURSOR = ID
  .HELP   = #RACMENU
  IF (&ID = NONE)
      &ID = ' '
  &OLDID = &ID
  IF (&ACC = DEFINED)
      &ACC = ' '
)PROC
  IF (&ID NE ' ')
     IF (&OLDID = &ID)
         &ID = ' '
     VER (&ID,NB)
     VER (&ACC,NB,LIST,USE,JOIN)
  IF (&ACC NE ' ')
     VER (&ID,NB)
)END

RACFUSR5.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   }  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF) JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)  COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
+Alt RACF%USER+profile: %ALTUSER+command
+
+PROFILE %===>_USER    {
+
{Enter%ALTUSER{operands to%alter{fields/segments from the user profile:
+
+OPERANDS%===>}NOS


                                  +
+
{Or select:
+  _z+NOTSO        _z+NOCICS           _z+NODFP            _z+NOOMVS
+  _z+TSO(NOPROC)  _z+CICS(NOOPCLASS)  _z+DFP(NODATACLAS)  _z+OMVS(NOHOME)
+  _z+TSO(NOACCT)  _z+CICS(NOOPIDENT)  _z+DFP(NOSTORCLAS)  _z+OMVS(NOPROGRAM)
+  _z+TSO(NOSIZE)  _z+CICS(NOOPPRTY)   _z+DFP(NOMGMTCLAS)
+  _z+TSO(NOUNIT)  _z+CICS(NOTIMEOUT)
+
+  _z+NOSPECIAL    _z+NOOPERATIONS     _z+NOGRPACC         _z+NOAUDITOR
+  _z+NOADSP       _z+NOROAUDIT        _z+NORESTRICTED
)INIT
  .CURSOR  = NOS
  .HELP    = #RACMENU
  &NOS     = ''
  &notso   = ''
  &notso1  = ''
  &notso2  = ''
  &notso3  = ''
  &notso4  = ''
  &nocics  = ''
  &nocics1 = ''
  &nocics2 = ''
  &nocics3 = ''
  &nocics4 = ''
  &nodfp   = ''
  &nodfp1  = ''
  &nodfp2  = ''
  &nodfp3  = ''
  &noomvs  = ''
  &noomvs1 = ''
  &noomvs2 = ''
  &nospec  = ''
  &noop    = ''
  &nogrp   = ''
  &noaud   = ''
  &noadsp  = ''
  &noraud  = ''
  &norest  = ''
  .zvars   = '(notso  nocics  nodfp  noomvs  +
               notso1 nocics1 nodfp1 noomvs1 +
               notso2 nocics2 nodfp2 noomvs2 +
               notso3 nocics3 nodfp3  +
               notso4 nocics4  +
               nospec noop nogrp noaud noadsp noraud norest)'
)PROC
  VER (&USER,NB)
  *rexx(*)
      if (notso <> '') then do
         notso = 'NOTSO'
         call addnos notso
      end
      else do
         if (notso1  /= '') then notso  = 'NOPROC'
         if (notso2  /= '') then notso  = notso 'NOACCT'
         if (notso3  /= '') then notso  = notso 'NOSIZE'
         if (notso4  /= '') then notso  = notso 'NOUNIT'
         if (notso   /= '') then do
            notso = 'TSO('strip(notso)')'
            call addnos notso
         end
      end

      if (nocics <> '') then do
         nocics = 'NOCICS'
         call addnos nocics
      end
      else do
         if (nocics1 /= '') then nocics = 'NOOPCLASS'
         if (nocics2 /= '') then nocics = nocics 'NOOPIDENT'
         if (nocics3 /= '') then nocics = nocics 'NOOPPRTY'
         if (nocics4 /= '') then nocics = nocics 'NOTIMEOUT'
         if (nocics  /= '') then do
            nocics = 'CICS('strip(nocics)')'
            call addnos nocics
         end
      end

      if (nodfp <> '') then do
         nodfp = 'NODFP'
         call addnos nodfp
      end
      else do
         if (nodfp1  /= '') then nodfp  = 'NODATACLAS'
         if (nodfp2  /= '') then nodfp  = nodfp 'NOSTORCLAS'
         if (nodfp3  /= '') then nodfp  = nodfp 'NOMGMTCLAS'
         if (nodfp   /= '') then do
            nodfp = 'DFP('strip(nodfp)')'
            call addnos nodfp
         end
      end

      if (noomvs <> '') then do
         noomvs = 'NOOMVS'
         call addnos noomvs
      end
      else do
         if (noomvs1 /= '') then noomvs = 'NOHOME'
         if (noomvs2 /= '') then noomvs = noomvs 'NOPROGRAM'
         if (noomvs  /= '') then do
            noomvs = 'OMVS('strip(noomvs)')'
            call addnos noomvs
         end
      end

      if (nospec  /= '') then call addnos 'NOSPECIAL'
      if (noop    /= '') then call addnos 'NOOPERATIONS'
      if (nogrp   /= '') then call addnos 'NOGRPACC'
      if (noraud  /= '') then call addnos 'NOROAUDIT'
      if (noadsp  /= '') then call addnos 'NOADSP'
      if (noaud   /= '') then call addnos 'NOAUDITOR'
      if (norest  /= '') then call addnos 'NORESTRICTED'
      signal done
    Addnos:
      arg opt
      if (pos(opt,nos) > 0) then return
      nos = nos opt
      return
    done:
  *endrexx

  ver (&nos,nb)
)END
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                             Comments                               */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                                                                    */
/*  1) To display/use this panel, the user must have the Settings     */
/*     (menu option 0) turned on:                                     */
/*       Administrator ..... Y                                        */
/*       Admin RACF API .... Y                                        */
/*                                                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

RACFUSR6.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   @  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(HIGH) SKIP(ON)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(ON)   JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   }  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(GREEN)
   [  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(GREEN)
   ~  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(LOW)  COLOR(BLUE)
   ]  TYPE(DATAOUT) INTENS(HIGH)
   !  TYPE(DATAIN)  INTENS(HIGH) CAPS(OFF)  JUST(LEFT)   HILITE(USCORE)
   ¬  AREA(DYNAMIC) EXTEND(OFF)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
¬USRTITL                                           ¬
+
%Base Segment:
+ PROFILE%===>_USER    {¬USERTXT           ¬+ ¬PSWDFLD                     ¬+
+ OWNER  %===>_BOWNER  { (Owner of profile)
+ DFLTGRP%===>_DEFGRP  { (Default group)
+ NAME   %===>_NAME                { (Last, first name)
+ ATTRIB %===>_ATTR                                                          @Z
+ DATA   %===>_IDATA                                                         @Z
+
%TSO Segment:              %CICS Segment:         %DFP Segment:
+ PROC   %===>_TSOPROC {   + OPCLASS%===>_Z +      +DATACLAS%===>_DDATACLS{
+ ACCT   %===>_TSOACCT {   + OPIDENT%===>_Z  +     +STORCLAS%===>_DSTORCLS{
+ SIZE   %===>_TSOSIZE{    + OPPRTY %===>_Z  +     +MGMTCLAS%===>_DMGMTCLS{
+ UNIT   %===>_TSOUNIT {   + TIMEOUT%===>_Z   +
+
%OMVS Segment:
 +HOME    %===>}OHOME                                                          +
 +PROGRAM %===>}OPROGRAM                                                       +


)INIT
  .ZVARS  = '(SCIND1 SCIND2 COPCLASS COPIDENT COPPRTY CTIMEOUT)'
  .CURSOR = USER
  .HELP   = #RACUSR6
  VGET (SETMIRRX SETMPHRA)
  &OLDUSR = &USER
  &FROM   = &USER
  IF (&USER = NONE)
     &USER = &RFILTER
  IF (&ACTION = '*Add')
     &USRTITL = '[Add RACF]USER[profile: ]ADDUSER[command'
     &USERTXT = '~(Enter]NEW~userid)'
  IF (&ACTION = '*Change')
     &USRTITL = '[Alt RACF]USER[profile: ]ALTUSER[command'
     &USERTXT = '~(Enter userid)'
     &PSWDFLD = ''

  *Rexx(* SETMIRRX SETMPHRA, PSWDFLD, PSWD ACTION)
     IF ACTION = '*Add' THEN  DO
        IF SETMPHRA = 'YES' THEN DO
          PSWD = LEFT(PSWD,14)
          PSWDFLD = '[PHRASE  ]===>!'pswd||']'
          END
        ELSE DO
          PSWD = LEFT(PSWD,8)
          PSWDFLD = '[PASSWORD]===>!'pswd||']'
          END
        END

     if SETMIRRX = 'NO' then do
        call listuser
        return
     end

     rxrc=IRRXUTIL("EXTRACT","USER",user,"RACF","")
     if (word(rxrc,1) <> 0) then do
        say 'IRRXUTIL return code:'rxrc
        exit
     end

     attr = ''
     if racf.base.special.1 = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'SPECIAL '
     if racf.base.oper.1    = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'OPERATIONS '
     if racf.base.grpacc.1  = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'GRPACC '
     if racf.base.auditor.1 = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'AUDITOR '
     if racf.base.roaudit.1 = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'ROAUDIT '
     if racf.base.rest.1    = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'RESTRICTED '
     if racf.base.adsp.1    = 'TRUE' then attr = attr || 'ADSP '

     bowner   = racf.base.owner.1
     defgrp   = racf.base.dfltgrp.1
     name     = racf.base.name.1
     idata    = racf.base.data.1

     tsoproc  = racf.tso.proc.1
     tsoacct  = racf.tso.acctnum.1
     tsosize  = racf.tso.size.1
     tsounit  = racf.tso.unit.1

     ohome    = racf.omvs.home.1
     oprogram = racf.omvs.program.1

     copclass = racf.cics.opclass.1
     copident = racf.cics.opident.1
     copprty  = racf.cics.opprty.1
     ctimeout = racf.cics.timeout.1

     ddatacls = racf.dfp.dataclas.1
     dstorcls = racf.dfp.storclas.1
     dmgmtcls = racf.dfp.mgmtclas.1

     return

     listuser:
       attr = ''
       cmd  = 'LISTUSER 'user' TSO CICS OMVS DFP'
       x    = outtrap('lu.')
       Address TSO cmd
       x    = outtrap('off')
       parse var value '' with bowner defgrp name idata attr ohome,
                    tsoproc tsoacct tsosize tsounit oprogram,
                    copclass copident copprty ctimeout,
                    ddatacls dstorcls dmgmtcls

       parse var lu.1 'NAME='name
       if (left(name,7) = 'UNKNOWN') then
          name = 'UNKNOWN'
       parse var lu.1 'OWNER='bowner .
       do i = 1 to lu.0
          if (substr(lu.i,2,14) = 'DEFAULT-GROUP=') then
             defgrp = substr(lu.i,2+14,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,2,11) = 'ATTRIBUTES=') then do
             if (pos('PASSPHRASE',lu.i,2+11) > 0) then
                lu.i = delstr(lu.i,pos('PASSPHRASE',lu.i,2+11),10)
             if (pos('PROTECTED',lu.i,2+11) > 0) then
                lu.i = delstr(lu.i,pos('PROTECTED',lu.i,2+11),9)
             if (pos('REVOKED',lu.i,2+11) > 0) then
                lu.i = delstr(lu.i,pos('REVOKED',lu.i,2+11),7)
             if (pos('NONE',lu.i,2+11) > 0) then
                lu.i = delstr(lu.i,pos('NONE',lu.i,2+11),4)
             attr = strip(substr(lu.i,2+11,60))' 'attr
          end

          if (substr(lu.i,2,18)) = 'INSTALLATION-DATA=' then do
             idata = substr(lu.i,2+18,50)
             do j = i+1 to i+5
               if (substr(lu.j,2,18)) = ' ' then
                 idata = idata||substr(lu.j,2+18,50)
               else
                 leave j
               end
             end
          if (substr(lu.i,1,6) = 'PROC= ') then
             tsoproc = substr(lu.i,1+6,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,9) = 'ACCTNUM= ') then
             tsoacct = substr(lu.i,1+9,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,6) = 'SIZE= ') then
             tsosize = substr(lu.i,2+6,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,6) = 'UNIT= ') then
             tsounit = substr(lu.i,1+6,8)

          if (substr(lu.i,2,9) = 'OPCLASS= ') then
             copclass = substr(lu.i,1+2+9,2)
          if (substr(lu.i,2,9) = 'OPIDENT= ') then
             copident = substr(lu.i,2+9,3)
          if (substr(lu.i,2,8) = 'OPPRTY= ') then
             copprty = substr(lu.i,2+2+8,3)
          if (substr(lu.i,2,9) = 'TIMEOUT= ') then do
             ctimeout = c2d(substr(lu.i,2+9,2),4)
             ctimeout = right(ctimeout,4,'0')
          end
          if (substr(lu.i,1,6) = 'HOME= ') then
             ohome = substr(lu.i,1+6,50)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,9) = 'PROGRAM= ') then
             oprogram = substr(lu.i,1+9,50)

          if (substr(lu.i,1,10) = 'DATACLAS= ') then
             ddatacls = substr(lu.i,1+10,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,10) = 'STORCLAS= ') then
             dstorcls = substr(lu.i,1+10,8)
          if (substr(lu.i,1,10) = 'MGMTCLAS= ') then
             dmgmtcls = substr(lu.i,1+10,8)
       end
     return
  *EndRexx

  IF (&ACTION = '*Add')
     &USER = &Z
     &NAME = &Z
)PROC
  *REXX (PSWDFLD, PSWD, USER, RACFLMSG)      /* Get password */
     IF SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,2,6) = 'PHRASE' THEN DO
       PSWD = SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,16,14)

       alpha = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'
       pswd_upper = translate(pswd)
       if pos(user,pswd_upper) > 0 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase contains Userid'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       x = 0; y= 0
       do n = 1 to 14
         if verify(substr(pswd,n,1),alpha) = 0 then
           x = x + 1
         else
           y = y + 1
         end
       if x < 2 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase must contain 2 alpha chars'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       if y < 2 then do
         zrxrc  = 8
         RACFLMSG = 'Phrase must contain 2 non-alpha chars'
         zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
         end
       do n = 1 to 12
         if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+1,1) then
           if substr(pswd,n,1) = substr(pswd,n+2,1) then do
             zrxrc  = 8
             RACFLMSG = 'Phrase contains repeating characters'
             zrxmsg = 'RACF011'
             end
         end
       END
     ELSE
       PSWD = SUBSTR(PSWDFLD,16,8)
  *ENDREXX
  IF (&ACTION = '*Add')
     IF (&OLDUSR = &USER)
        &USER = ' '
  VER (&USER,NB)
  VER (&BOWNER,NB,NAME)
  VER (&DEFGRP,NB,NAME)
  VER (&NAME,NB)
  IF (&TSOPROC NE &Z)
     VER (&TSOACCT,NB)
     VER (&TSOSIZE,NB,NUM)
     VER (&TSOUNIT,NB)
  IF (&TSOACCT NE &Z)
     VER (&TSOPROC,NB,NAME)
     VER (&TSOSIZE,NB,NUM)
     VER (&TSOUNIT,NB)
  IF (&TSOSIZE NE &Z)
     VER (&TSOPROC,NB,NAME)
     VER (&TSOACCT,NB)
     VER (&TSOUNIT,NB)
  IF (&TSOUNIT NE &Z)
     VER (&TSOPROC,NB,NAME)
     VER (&TSOACCT,NB)
     VER (&TSOSIZE,NB,NUM)
  VER (&COPCLASS,NUM)
  VER (&COPPRTY,NUM)
  VER (&CTIMEOUT,NUM)
)FIELD
  FIELD(ATTR)  IND(SCIND1,'<>') LEN(255)
  FIELD(IDATA) IND(SCIND2,'<>') LEN(255)
)END
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                             Comments                               */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/*                                                                    */
/*  1) To display/use this panel, the user must have the Settings     */
/*     (menu option 0) turned on                                      */
/*       Administrator ..... Y                                        */
/*                                                                    */
/*  2) This panel is used for Adding and Changing a userid            */
/*     - Line commands 'A' and 'C' respectively                       */
/*     - This is done by using dynamic areas for the user title       */
/*       and password fields (USRTITL and PSWDFLD)                    */
/*                                                                    */
/*  3) The )INIT section executes REXX code to obtain userid          */
/*     information (ATTR, TSOPROC, etc.) by invoking IRRXUTIL of      */
/*     executing LISTUSER command and parses through the output       */
/*     - If settings, menu option 0, 'Admin RACF API = Y' then        */
/*       execute IRRXUTIL, else LISTUSER command                      */
/*                                                                    */
/*  4) The 'ATTR' field is a scrollable field                         */
/*                                                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/

RACFUSR7.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   $  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  JUST(LEFT) COLOR(TURQ)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) JUST(LEFT) CAPS(ON)     HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
+Connect RACF%USER+profile: %CONNECT+command
+
+PROFILE%===>$USER    +$NAME
+
+ID     %===>$ID      { (User or group)
+ACC    %===>_ACC     { (Access level, USE/JOIN)
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+\ \Press%ENTER+to process or%END+to exit\ \
)INIT
  .CURSOR  = ACC
  .HELP    = #RACMENU
  IF (&ACC = DEFINED)
      &ACC = ' '
)PROC
  VER (&ACC,NB,LIST,USE,JOIN)
)END

RACFUSR8.text:
)ATTR DEFAULT(%+_)
   $  TYPE(OUTPUT)  INTENS(LOW)  JUST(LEFT) COLOR(TURQ)
   _  TYPE(INPUT)   INTENS(HIGH) JUST(LEFT) CAPS(ON)     HILITE(USCORE)
   {  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(BLUE)
   +  TYPE(TEXT)    INTENS(LOW)  SKIP(ON)   COLOR(GREEN)
)BODY EXPAND(\\)
+\-\(%RACFADM - User Profiles+)\-\
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%
+Alt RACF%USER+profile: %ALTUSER+command
+
+PROFILE%===>$USER    { (Userid)
+
+TSOPROC%===>_TSOPROC { (TSO logon procedure)
+TSOACCT%===>_TSOACCT { (TSO account number)
+TSOSIZE%===>_TSOSIZE{  (TSO A/S size)
+TSOUNIT%===>_TSOUNIT { (TSO temporary files unit)
+TSOLIB %===>_Z{        (Y=Yes, N=No)
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+\ \Press%ENTER+to process or%END+to exit\ \
)INIT
  .ZVARS  = '(TSOLIB)'
  .CURSOR = TSOPROC
  .HELP   = #RACMENU
)PROC
  VER (&TSOPROC,NB)
  VER (&TSOACCT,NB)
  VER (&TSOSIZE,NB,NUM)
  VER (&TSOUNIT,NB)
  VER (&TSOLIB,NB,LIST,Y,N)
)END
